    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ALL_ROLES

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_ALL_ROLES
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SITE_ADMIN_GROUP

        public static final String SITE_ADMIN_GROUP
        Site admin group is the parent/ancester group for all other groups. If a group has parent null, the site admin group is considered to be its parent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMMON_GROUP

        public static final String COMMON_GROUP
        Shared group is a virtual group (not really persisted in database) that everyone belongs to. This is specifically useful for backward compatibility, where resources with no association of groups are assumed to belong to this group.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMMON_GROUP_ID

        public static final Long COMMON_GROUP_ID
